attributes.action: Replace the political chancellor of the exchequer and its treasury with qualified chartered accountants/economists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The chancellor of the exchequer should be a non political position who is either a qualified accountant or has great in depth knowledge of the economy who is then required to serve the nation under due diligence and with authority to act in the best interests of the country and its people not as at present the party they serve. The Treasury department should also be a department run by qualified accountants/economists not civil cervants with no political allegance and will run the finances of the country for the country. This new position should also answerable in its actions to ALL political parties and the Bank of England.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
